tool_description: Scrape and extract data from any website, with powerful options like proxy / browser customization, CAPTCHA handling, ad blocking, and more.
name: Web scraping and proxy
title: Web scraping and proxy

api_list.name: Target URL
api_list.description: To make a request, you simply include the target URL  API will return the data from that site. Optional configuration options, like proxies, location of the request, and more are possible to include.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to extract the data from. Note that this parameter should include the full HTTP Protocol (http:// or https://). If your URL has parameters, you should encode it. For example the & character would be encoded to %26. Your should check your language for native support of URL encoding or use a third party library.
